remarks: Distributive law for the division operation of a ring.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Oct-2017.)
statement:
dvrdir.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
dvrdir.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
dvrdir.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
dvrdir.t $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
dvrdir $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. U ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) ./ Z ) = ( ( X ./ Z ) .+ ( Y ./ Z ) ) ) $.
